item.title: 加强库存管理后，三星芯片业务超出预期
item.description: 三星电子公司芯片部门公布的利润好于预期，因为中国客户在美国加征关税前急于囤积供应。【原文：Samsung Electronics Co.’s chip division reported better-than-expected profit after Chinese customers rushed to stockpile supplies ahead of US tariffs.】

item.title: 斯坦查特称印度绿色规则的明确性将促进交易
item.description: 渣打银行（Standard Chartered Plc）认为，如果没有一个所谓的分类框架，为气候融资设立一个警戒线，印度将很难实现其绿色目标。【原文：India could struggle to meet its green targets without a so-called taxonomy framework, which creates guardrails around what can pass as climate finance, according to Standard Chartered Plc.】

item.title: 投票临近，特朗普表示计划与澳大利亚总理商谈贸易问题
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示有可能再次与澳大利亚总理通话，讨论他对美国长期盟友澳大利亚征收关税的问题。【原文：US President Donald Trump has flagged the possibility of another call with Australia’s prime minister to discuss tariffs he imposed on the longtime American ally.】

item.title: 尽管存在贸易争端，迪士尼和环球电影仍将在中国上映
item.description: 即使与美国的贸易争端仍在继续，中国仍对好莱坞电影敞开大门。【原文：China is keeping the door open for Hollywood movies, even with the ongoing trade dispute with the US.】

item.title: 贸易紧张局势缓解，避险需求减弱，黄金维持跌势
item.description: 由于唐纳德-特朗普总统缓解了部分汽车关税的影响，并指出与一些国家的贸易谈判取得了进展，黄金在周二下跌后持稳。【原文：Gold was steady after dropping Tuesday as President Donald Trump eased the impact of some auto tariffs and pointed to progress in trade negotiations with several countries.】

item.title: Sunnova 正在洽谈为可能的破产融资
item.description: 据熟悉情况的人士透露，屋顶太阳能电池板系统销售商 Sunnova Energy International Inc.【原文：Sunnova Energy International Inc., a seller of rooftop solar-panel systems, is in discussions with its creditors to borrow money to finance a potential bankruptcy, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 贸易战和库存增加给石油前景蒙上阴影，石油止跌回升
item.description: 由于有迹象表明贸易战正在损害经济增长，而且一个行业组织指出美国库存增加，石油维持在三周低点附近。【原文：Oil held near a three-week low — after tumbling more than 2% on Tuesday — on signs that the trade war is hurting economic growth, and as an industry group flagged a rise in US stockpiles.】

item.title: Grab 上调预期，因乘车需求带动收入超出预期
item.description: 在季度销售额超过预期后，Grab 控股有限公司上调了全年盈利预期，这表明在受全球贸易紧张局势影响的科技行业中，东南亚打车和食品配送市场可能是一个亮点。【原文：Grab Holdings Ltd. raised its full-year earnings forecast after quarterly sales beat estimates, a sign that the Southeast Asian ride-hailing and food-delivery market might be a bright spot in a tech industry rattled by global trade tensions.】

item.title: 亚洲股市有望追随看涨的华尔街：市场综述
item.description: 亚洲股市将进一步追随华尔街的涨势，因为市场押注美国企业将经受住经济增长放缓和关税引发的干扰，这使得标准普尔500指数连续第六天上涨。【原文：Stocks in Asia are set to track further gains on Wall Street as bets that Corporate America will weather slowing economic growth and tariff-fueled disruptions sent the S&P 500 up for a sixth day.】

item.title: 友邦保险看到香港和中国需求带来的新业务增长
item.description: 友邦保险集团有限公司公布，受香港和中国大陆等核心市场销售强劲的推动，第一季度新保单盈利能力同比增长。【原文：AIA Group Ltd. reported year-on-year growth for the profitability of new policies in the first quarter, propelled by strong sales in core markets including Hong Kong and mainland China.】

item.title: 关税 "风暴 "令泰国经济前景黯淡，泰国将再次下调利率
item.description: 在泰国央行行长警告经济面临全球贸易战带来的 "风暴 "之后，泰国央行可能会被说服动用其有限的政策弹药，再次降息。【原文：The Bank of Thailand may be convinced to wield its limited policy ammunition and deliver another rate cut after the governor warned that the economy faces a “storm” from the global trade war.】

item.title: 智利将利率维持在 5%，应对通胀和增长的威胁
item.description: 智利央行连续第三次会议维持其关键利率不变，理由是唐纳德-特朗普总统的贸易关税引发了全球动荡，以及通胀 "升高"。【原文：Chile’s central bank kept its key interest rate unchanged for the third straight meeting, citing the global turmoil triggered by President Donald Trump’s trade tariffs and “elevated” inflation.】

item.title: B.Riley 披露 Finra 对财富管理业务的检查结果
item.description: B.莱利金融公司（Biley Financial Inc. ）正面临当局更多的审查，该公司透露，美国金融业监管局（Financial Industry Regulatory Authority）正在调查该公司的财富管理业务。【原文：B. Riley Financial Inc. is facing more scrutiny from authorities, with the company disclosing that the Financial Industry Regulatory Authority is looking into the firm’s wealth management business.】

item.title: 60 亿美元的资金缺口让美国公共交通面临死亡螺旋
item.description:
联邦政府投入了 700 亿美元，用于在大流行病期间提供通勤铁路和公共汽车服务。这笔资金即将用完。【原文：

The federal government stepped in with $70 billion to get commuter rail and bus service through the pandemic. The funds are running out.

】

item.title: 司法部谷歌反垄断案收官，新一代人工智能成为焦点
item.description: 美国司法部针对谷歌在网络搜索市场的非法垄断所提出的解决方案，比谷歌提供的补救措施更有可能促进竞争，反垄断执法人员传唤的一位经济学家在政府对这家科技巨头进行的具有里程碑意义的审判中作证。【原文：The US Justice Department’s proposed fixes for Google’s illegal monopoly in the online search market are more likely to spur competition than the remedies offered by the company, an economist called by antitrust enforcers testified in the government’s landmark trial against the tech giant.】

item.title: 特朗普预测中国将 "吃掉 "关税，减轻对美国的影响
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统说，他对中国出口商品征收高额关税是中国应得的，并预测中国政府可以找到办法减少关税对美国消费者的影响。【原文：President Donald Trump said China deserved the steep tariffs he imposed on their exports and predicted Beijing could find a way to reduce their impact on American consumers.】

item.title: 超微公司初步业绩不及预期，股价暴跌
item.description: 超级微电脑公司（Super Micro Computer Inc）在发布了远低于分析师预期的初步业绩后，在尾盘交易中暴跌，这表明该公司的东山再起计划进展缓慢。【原文：Super Micro Computer Inc. tumbled in late trading after giving preliminary results that fell well short of analysts’ estimates, a sign its comeback plan has been slow to gain traction.】

item.title: 美国 ADM 公司裁员，瑞士全球大宗商品交易平台受到冲击
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Archer-Daniels-Midland 公司正在裁减其全球商品部的工作岗位，因为对其会计实务的调查使这家农业巨头的价值缩水了数十亿美元。【原文：Archer-Daniels-Midland Co. is cutting jobs at its global commodity desk after a probe into its accounting practices wiped out billions from the agriculture giant’s value, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 1,800 万美元期权押注美联储全年维持利率不变
item.description: 至少有一位大期权交易商已经下注 1,800 万美元，赌美联储今年任何时候都不会降息。【原文：At least one big option trader has dialed up an $18 million bet that the Federal Reserve will avoid cutting interest rates any time this year.】

item.title: 警告 "逆风 "将损害广告销售，Snap 公司股价下跌
item.description: Snap 公司第一季度营收略高于分析师预期，但拒绝发布当期销售预测，称其广告业务正在应对宏观经济的 "逆风"。【原文：Snap Inc. narrowly beat analysts’ estimates for first-quarter revenue but declined to issue a sales forecast for the current period, saying it’s navigating macroeconomic “headwinds” for its advertising business.】

item.title: 金砖国家在里约出现裂痕，新成员对过去的协议持反对态度
item.description: 金砖国家集团在欢迎新成员加入俱乐部后不久，就遇到了困扰其他全球多边机构的同样问题：其成员无法在关键问题上达成一致。【原文：Shortly after welcoming new members to the club, the BRICS bloc of nations is suffering from the same problem dogging other global multilateral institutions: Its members can’t agree on key issues.】

item.title: 23andMe 同意支持一位客户 DNA 数据隐私倡导者
item.description: 破产的 DNA 检测公司 23andMe 同意支持法院批准的数据隐私监察员，作为公司破产的一部分，该监察员将审查客户基因数据的出售情况。【原文：Bankrupt DNA testing firm 23andMe agreed to support a court-approved data privacy ombudsman who would review the sale of customer’s genetic data as part of the company’s bankruptcy.】

item.title: 惠而浦因消费者需求疲软被穆迪下调至 "垃圾 "评级
item.description: KitchenAid 和 Maytag 电器制造商惠而浦公司被穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）降至垃圾级，理由是消费需求疲软、房地产市场放缓以及公司债务负担沉重。【原文：Whirlpool Corp., the maker of KitchenAid and Maytag appliances, saw its credit grades cut to junk status by Moody’s Ratings, which cited weak consumer demand, a slow housing market and the company’s high debt load.】

item.title: 阿纳海姆鸭队业主启动 10 亿美元球馆重建计划
item.description: 美国国家冰球联盟（National Hockey League）阿纳海姆鸭队（Anaheim Ducks）的所有者塞缪尔利家族（Samueli Family）周二公布了一项私人融资 10 亿美元的本田中心（Honda Center）重建计划，该中心是加利福尼亚州阿纳海姆市拥有的体育馆，也是鸭队的主场。【原文：The Samueli Family, owners of the National Hockey League’s Anaheim Ducks, on Tuesday unveiled a $1 billion privately financed redevelopment of Honda Center, the city-owned arena in Anaheim, California, that serves as the team’s home ice.】

item.title: 科氏退出石油和燃料贸易业务，从投机中撤退
item.description: 亿万富翁科赫家族控制的企业集团科赫工业公司（Koch Industries）正在全球范围内退出石油和成品油贸易，从投机活动中抽身，转而进入回报率更具吸引力的领域。【原文：Koch Industries, the conglomerate controlled by the billionaire Koch family, is exiting oil and refined products trading globally to pull back from speculation and push into areas with more attractive returns.】

item.title: 对冲基金对市场失去信心，但做空美股除外
item.description: 对冲基金经理们在关税标题对市场造成冲击时一直按兵不动，他们仍不愿下大赌注，但有一个很大的例外：做空美股。【原文：Hedge fund managers who’ve been holding fire as tariff headlines whipsawed markets are still reluctant to place any major bets, with one big exception: shorting US stocks.】

item.title: 莫桑比克批准削减开支的 80 亿美元预算
item.description: 在大选后的动乱削弱了经济增长和财政收入之后，莫桑比克在其 2025 年预算计划中将支出比去年同期削减了 9%。【原文：Mozambique cut spending by 9% in its 2025 budget plan compared with a year earlier after post-election unrest dented growth and revenues.】

item.title: 加纳逮捕三名涉嫌走私黄金的印度国民
item.description: 加纳逮捕了三名印度人，他们涉嫌在过去十年中将黄金走私出西非国家。【原文：Ghana has arrested three Indian nationals for allegedly smuggling gold out of the West African nation for the past decade.】

item.title: 西凯拉说：欧盟向美国提出让步以恢复 "稳定
item.description: 欧盟国际伙伴关系专员表示，欧盟已向唐纳德-特朗普政府提出了切实可行的建议，以努力恢复全球经济的稳定。【原文：The European Union has made tangible offers to Donald Trump’s administration in an effort to return stability to the global economy, according to the bloc’s commissioner for international partnerships.】

item.title: 市场和实体经济又多了两个不祥之兆
item.description:
